message.content:
I need to calculate the Net Profit Margin based on the income statement provided.

The Net Profit Margin is calculated as:
Net Profit Margin = (Net Profit / Total Revenue) × 100%

From the income statement:
- Net Profit = $111,731.83
- Total Revenue = $791,992.51

Calculating the Net Profit Margin:
Net Profit Margin = ($111,731.83 / $791,992.51) × 100%
Net Profit Margin = 0.1410767 × 100%
Net Profit Margin = 14.11%

```json
{"solution": {'Net Profit Margin': '14.11%'}}
```
